content.raw:
After alot of trials trying to fix the `Lines Visuals` of the double pendulum, and all the other models that I've tried so far have no problems with their `Lines Visuals`, may be it is something related to the model?

e.g. ![comvisualsLines.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/2606197253-comvisualsLines.png)


 The `Lines Visuals` calculations starts from [this line](#!/osrf/gzweb/pull-requests/123/view-com/diff#add-comment) If someone had an idea what could be wrong.
